meanings.definition: In the direction or towards the east.
meanings.sent1: The sun rose eastwards every morning.
meanings.sent2: She walked eastwards to reach the park.
meanings.sent3: The cat chased the butterfly eastwards, trying to catch it.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts always drifted eastwards, towards his hometown.
meanings.sent5: The wind blew eastwards, carrying the scent of fresh flowers.

meanings.definition: Moving or facing towards the east.
meanings.sent1: The eastwards journey was long but rewarding.
meanings.sent2: The eastwards window offered a beautiful view of the sunrise.
meanings.sent3: The eastwards-facing house always got the morning sun first.
meanings.sent4: The eastwards path led them to a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The eastwards wind whispered secrets from distant lands.
